name: LOC Documentation
description: FST Network's user documentation for Logic Operating Centre (LOC) built on React-based Docusaurus 3
tooltip:
I'm the creator and currently the sole maintainer. The site in the link is actually a archived version deployed on Vercel. For the official version, please visit here.

The site includes a code template generator and unit test tool I've designed and developed on my own.

name: Svelte/Golang Full-Stack Demo App
description: A monolithic full-stack shopping demo app inspired by the book Essential TypeScript

name: Online TypeScript Editor
description: A simple online editor with IntelliSense support that can execute code directly in browser
tooltip: A similar Python editor can be found here.

name: MicroPython Driver for TEA5767 FM Radio Module
description: A radio driver utilizing most of the features documented in the datasheet
tooltip: A CircuitPython version is also available here.

name: SEFR Multiclass Classifier
description: The first multi-class classifier implementation based on SEFR, a fast linear-time binary classifier designed for model training on low-powered microcontrollers

name: MakeCode Editor Extension for Nexus:bit and NexusBot
description: A MakeCode editor extension (written in TypeScript) for controlling the micro:bit expansion board, Nexus:bit (a KittenBot Robot:bit clone) and Nexusbot (an OTTO robot-clone)
tooltip:
My former employer changed the author name to his after I left, however you can still find my name in the source code (including the original repo he forked).

The extension also includes a long robot dance sequence based on the dance in the Japanese TV drama 'We married as a job!'.
